mapper.select: SELECT UPLOAD_DET_ID , UPLOAD_ID , T1.USER_MEM_CODE , T3.NAME MEM_NM, T4.CODE_NAME MEM_TYPE , T2.NAME VALID_STUS , T1.VALID_REM FROM ORG0039D T1 JOIN SYS0038M T2 ON T2.STUS_CODE_ID = T1.VALID_STUS_ID LEFT JOIN ORG0001D T3 ON T3.MEM_ID = T1.SYS_MEM_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0013M T4 ON T4.CODE_ID = T3.MEM_TYPE WHERE UPLOAD_ID = #{conForm_uploadId}
